long_description: Inspired by the Fly Creek UL line, the ultralight, 3-season Big Agnes Slater UL3+ tent offers the same light and fast design for three backpackers, plus extra floor space and less canopy mesh. Extra space comes at little cost in terms of weight; lightweight, breathable ripstop nylon walls offer extra warmth, privacy and protection. Light and strong DAC Featherlite(R) NSL poles, press-fit connectors and a lightweight hub use an anodization process with fewer chemicals than other processes. DAC twist clips and color-coded pole ends, webbing and buckles make setting up the Big Agnes Slater UL3+ quick and easy. Woven nylon mesh in the upper canopy provides ventilation; ripstop nylon helps keep sand and wind out of the tent when you head to the desert. Polyurethane- and silicone-coated high-tenacity ripstop nylon fly and floor; waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape seals all seams. Fly vent improves ventilation to reduce condensation; stormflap over vestibule zipper prevents water drips. Reflective guyouts and reflective webbing on tent corners increase visibility at night. 5 interior mesh pockets and gear loft loops (gear loft sold separately) accommodate storage. For a lightweight setup during nice weather leave tent body behind; use the rainfly and footprint (sold separately) with the poles and stakes. The Big Agnes Slater UL3+ tent comes with 15 superlight aluminum J stakes and stuff sacks.
short_description: Inspired by the Fly Creek UL line, the ultralight, 3-season Big Agnes Slater UL3+ tent offers the same light and fast design for three backpackers, plus extra floor space and less canopy mesh.
